about_the_game:
When a local farm is attacked by a group of bandits, Sheriff Sam Judge sets out to bring them to justice. But on his journey, Sam finds himself transported to another world overrun with prehistoric creatures, dinosaurs and now must fight for his life to make it back to earth.

"A real cowboy ain't afraid of nothin."

Developed by TeamKill Media.

Son and Bone is a fast-paced first-person shooter where you take on the role of Sam Judge, a Sheriff, that after tracking down a notorious bandit who attacked a farm and kidnapped a local, has found himself on an alien world overrun by prehistoric creatures and dinosaurs.

-Fast-paced first-person shooter
Old-school meets modern mechanics in an intense display of fast movement, double jumping and dashing and grapple swinging.

-Enemy finishers (Judgements)
Crush the bones and tear the flesh of your enemies as you issue Judgement upon them with brutal enemy finishers.

-No reloading
Ain't no one got time for reloadin.

-Large variety of dinosaurs
From Raptors to T-rex's, prepare to go toe-to-toe with a huge cast of dinosaurs who want you for dinner.

-Large variety of weapons from different eras
Blast through your enemies with weapons from different periods in time, from revolvers to rocket launchers, you have no shortage of options for complete destruction.

content_descriptors.notes: Weapons are used to kill and dismember dinosaurs and aliens.

  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 Super / Radeon RX 5700XT
